Plot: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.
Title: Senna
Actors: Ayrton Senna, Alain Prost, Frank Williams, Ron Dennis
tomatoConsensus: Even for filmgoers who aren't racing fans, Senna offers heart-pounding thrills -- and heartbreaking emotion.
Awards: Won 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 14 wins & 17 nominations.
